long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension converts USD to Satoshis. Just use your mouse to highlight any USD price on the screen and a tooltip popup will appear with the price in satoshis. The price used is pulled from coinbase and might not reflect on the spot price changes.Make sure to double check prices. works with or without highlighting the "$" symbol
